lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Japanese Finance Minister Kiichi Miyazawa fuelled speculation about the amount of fluctuation the authorities are prepared to tolerate by saying that the current yen level is still inside the range agreed on in Paris in late February.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Dealers restrained their underlying bearishness and squared positions ahead of Wednesday's meeting of the finance ministers and central bankers of the top seven industrialized nations in Washington.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: They anticipated a concerted effort to prop up the dollar and restrain the yen via a mixture of open market intervention and public comments.
